WDY_CTLR_COMPOT.DESCRIPTION: Handling for Suspending and Resuming an Application
Error Handling by Application Before Navigation
Method for non-action specific operations before navigation
Method for Validation of User Input
Method for Modifying the View Before Rendering
Method for Modifying the Context Menu

WDY_CTLR_COMPO_SOURCE_VRS.SOURCE_LINE: DATA lo_window_manager TYPE REF TO if_wd_window_manager.
DATA lo_api_component TYPE REF TO if_wd_component.
DATA lo_window TYPE REF TO if_wd_window.
* create the cancel icon, but without any action handler
* Simple example, see docu of method create_and_open_popup for details
DATA: lo_popup TYPE REF TO if_wd_window.
IF lo_popup IS NOT INITIAL AND lo_popup->is_modal( ) EQ abap_true.
DATA: lt_string TYPE TABLE OF string,
DATA lo_nd_receiver TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_node.
DATA: lo_node TYPE REF TO if_wd_context_node,
new_items = lt_receiver " List of Elements or Model Data
set_initial_elements = abap_false " If TRUE, Set Initial Elements Otherwise Add
index = context_element->get_index( ) " Index of Context Element
* data lo_api_controller type ref to if_wd_view_controller.
* data lo_action type ref to if_wd_action.
DATA: lt_spfli TYPE TABLE OF spfli.
